faq.title: How do I buy a domain name?
faq.answer: 1. Select the domain(s) you’d like to buy and click ‘Add to Cart’. Fill in your details at checkout, then complete your payment. 2. Your payment will be verified, and we make sure that it has been cleared successfully. 3. Once your order is confirmed and verified, we will email you giving full instructions with the domain name(s) transfer process.

faq.title: What’s included with my purchase?
faq.answer:
When you buy a domain name from our marketplace the ownership of the domain name passes from us to you and there are no restrictions on how you can use it.

Each purchase includes the domain name(s) and a Pre-designed logo(s) or text illustration displayed along the domain names on your request. (custom logo design can be provided separately on your request).

faq.title: Do I get a website with the domain?
faq.answer: No. There are not websites included with the domain names, but if you are looking for a great website, we can recommend someone to you.

faq.title: When does the domain name registration expire after the transfer?
faq.answer:
Once the domain name is successfully transferred to you, then it is Active for the term of the registration.

It is the buyer’s responsibility to verify and renew the domain registration before the expiration date. Annual registration costs vary, averaging between $10-$20 per year, per .com domain.

faq.title: Is the logo file included in the purchase?
faq.answer: If there is a logo displayed with the desired domain, then the original logo file will be included free of charge.

faq.title: Can I make an offer?
faq.answer:
Yes, we only accept offers on domains with Make Offer sign. We are selling domains at affordable price and each has its individual set price based on its quality.

We are willing to negotiate with potential buyers, who plan to offer on more than one domain.

Regarding to a bulk sale discount request, please submit your desired domains from our store in email via Brandshore contact page.

faq.title: Are your domain names and logos already trademarked?
faq.answer: No. When purchasing a brand from Brandshore marketplace you will get the ownership rights to the domain name and logo design artwork that we provide with it for Free without copyright.

faq.title: Can I make my purchase in instalments?
faq.answer: Yes, we do accept instalment or lease to own option, plus you have ability to reserve domain names with Instalment sign.

faq.title: Can I resell the logo that comes with the domain?
faq.answer: Yes. Full ownership of the intellectual property passes from us to you, so you as a buyer may resell or lend a copy together or without the domain.

faq.title: Can I reserve a domain with a small deposit?
faq.answer: Yes.You can reserve a domain name with an advance down payment of 20% of the total price and the remaining 80% must be completed within 30 days. This deposit is non-refundable.

faq.title: Do you have a refund policy?
faq.answer:
Yes. Refunds for purchased domain names are only allowed if the order has been canceled within 3 days of purchase and the property transfer has not been confirmed.

In a case that the domain transfer fails to initiate within 7 days from the time of purchase the client will be entitled to a full refund. See Refund Policy

faq.title: I have a question that isn’t answered here.
faq.answer: Feel free to send us an email with your questions to info@brandshore.com
